RevisionEvent.Note: Updated to SPASE Version 2.3.2 if needed, Applied quality control for DOI usage, LFB

ResourceHeader.Description: This catalog has a list of the Solar Energetic Particles (SEP) Events observed by STEREO-A and/or STEREO-B. For each of the observations, the following information is given: event start time, event end time, STEREO maximum_flux fluence, and a comment. It is expected that this list, given in both PDF and Excel formats, will be updated periodically.

PublicationInfo.PublishedBy: STEREO Science Center at the NASA Solar Data Analysis Center

AccessURL.Name: SEP list, text version
AccessURL.Description: For Excel version, go to Information URL above

AccessURL.Name: SEP list, PDF version
AccessURL.Description: For Excel version, go to Information URL above

TimeSpan.Note: The events in 2006 are in the solar wind, outside the Earth's bow shock. There are no events reaching the criterion in 2007-2010 at either STEREO spacecraft.
